about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Ashoka Metcast Limited is Ahmedabad Gujrat-based company engaged in trading of structural steel products such as Round Bars, Flat Bars etc. Company is proposing to manufacture structural steel products like TMT bars, angles, channels, MS Bars etc.

Ashoka Metcast Limited is part of a diversified business group with business interests in various sectors including Oil and Gas, Steel, Infrastructure, Electronic Equipments and Real Estate. Its flagship Group Company - Gujarat Natural Resources Limited is engaged in the business of Oil & Gas exploration and production and currently has participating interests in 6 producing blocks in Cambay basin and is operator in four of these blocks. The company is listed on BSE and has a market capitalisation of around 125 crores.

faqs.question: What is the Ashoka Metcast IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ashoka Metcast IPO is a SME IPO of 6000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on January 23, 2018, and closes on January 25, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ashoka Metcast IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ashoka Metcast IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ashoka Metcast IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ashoka Metcast IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ashoka Metcast IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ashoka Metcast IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ashoka Metcast IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
